code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import api from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskForm(_ref){let{fetchTasks,editingTask,setEditingTask}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[description,setDescription]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{if(editingTask){setTitle(editingTask.title);setDescription(editingTask.description);}},[editingTask]);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(editingTask){await api.put("/tasks/".concat(editingTask.id),{title,description});setEditingTask(null);}else{await api.post("/tasks",{title,description});}setTitle("");setDescription("");fetchTasks();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"submit",children:[editingTask?"Update":"Add"," Task"]})]});}export default TaskForm;
